sentences.en: a tribe of Aborigines known as the Dolphin People
sentences.cn: 一个叫“海豚族”的澳大利亚土著部落

sentences.en: A tribe of artists live in Greenwich Village.
sentences.cn: 在格林威治村住着许多艺术家.

sentences.en: Few know that the tribe was just passing through.
sentences.cn: 很少有人知道那个部族只是路过。

sentences.en: He sent a letter inviting Naomi to attend his installation as chief of his tribe.
sentences.cn: 他给娜奥米寄了封信，邀请她来参加他就任部落酋长的仪式。

sentences.en: His intercession could be of help to the tribe.
sentences.cn: 他的调解可能会帮上该部落的忙。

sentences.en: It missed its mark, and completely failed, as is often the way with his tribe too.
sentences.cn: 可他这一招并不灵, 对方完全不理会 ——.这样的现象在这帮人之间也是常有的.

sentences.en: Many a tribe and ruling house has survived by intermarrying with its rivals, rather than waging war on them.
sentences.cn: 许多部落和有门望的家族都靠与敌方通婚而不是发动战争而生存下来.

sentences.en: Many of the tribe's customs and rituals are as old as the hills.
sentences.cn: 这部落的许多风俗、仪式都极其古老.

sentences.en: The adoption had to be confirmed by ceremonial acceptance into the tribe.
sentences.cn: 为了确认这种收养,必须举行入族典礼.

sentences.en: The tribe has been forced to modify its chauvinistic attitudes.
sentences.cn: 部族不得不改变它的沙文主义姿态。

sentences.en: The tribe's development was more primitive than that of their neighbours.
sentences.cn: 那个部落处于比邻近部落更原始的发展阶段.

sentences.en: The valley is inhabited by the Dani tribe.
sentences.cn: 山谷里居住着达尼部落。

sentences.en: The village tribe is friendly and they share their water supply with you.
sentences.cn: 村里的部落很友善，他们会和你一起分享水源。

sentences.en: The whole tribe was in the joke.
sentences.cn: 整个部落的人都卷入了这场恶作剧.
这是个受他人统治的部落.

words.tran_cn: 部落文化；部落制；部落制度

trans.tran_cn: 部落，部族，[生]族，一帮，一伙，大群
trans.tran_en: a social group consisting of people of the same  race  who have the same beliefs, customs, language etc, and usually live in one particular area ruled by their leader
